name: Lord Monarch: Tokoton Sentou Densetsu
summary: Lord Monarch is a 1991 strategy game for the NEC PC-98 by Falcom and the seventh main title in their Dragon Slayer series. Sega Falcom remade it for the Sega Mega Drive in 1994, this time called Lord Monarch: Tokoton Sentou Densetsu (ロードモナーク・とことん戦闘伝説). This version was not released outside Japan.
